mapper.update: update judge_doc set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, court = #{court,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_number = #{caseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, judge_time = #{judgeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_type = #{caseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_doc = #{caseDoc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, title, court, case_number, judge_time, case_type, case_doc from judge_doc where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, title, court, case_number, judge_time, case_type, case_doc from judge_doc
